job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: Remote USltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtJob DescriptionltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtOur Retention Team is looking for a Data Scientist The ideal candidate will have experience in extracting insights from relational databases and conveying them to a business audience In this role you will use your experience with data and statistics to drive customer retention and expansion through various data science techniques such as churn prediction customer segmentation and feature recommendation Excellent communication skills are also required as this is a highly visible and influential role that will collaborate with crossfunctional teams and present information to business leadersltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtResponsibilitiesltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligtPartners with our Marketing Customer Success Sales and Product Teams to drive customer retention and expansionltligtltligtBuilds predictive models and leverages statistical algorithms to apply machine learning techniques to our internal data to address business issues and drive improved outcomes of KPIs such as retention and expansion of revenueltligtltligtPresents technical findings in a summarized form to nontechnical audiences translates complex quantitative data into succinct actionable insightsltligtltligtDesigns implements and measures results for AB and multivariate tests drives end to end test process from launch to readout to recommendation to retestltligtltligtWorks with members of multiple departments to understand processes data and reporting requirementsltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtQualificationsltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligtAt least 2 years of experience in an analytical andor data science role in a business environmentltligtltligtExperience in SQL and Python ltligtltligtVersed in the fundamentals of statistics with a working understanding of machine learning algorithms and their applicationsltligtltligtExperience in analyzing business problems and converting them to data problemsltligtltligtExperience in simplifying and visualizing analytical outputs to suit business audienceltligtltligtStrong communicationinteraction skills  proven trackrecord of impacting business performance with analyticsltligtltligtStrong work ethic complimented by a proactive problem solver attitudeltligtltligtExperience with Tableau or other data visualization tools preferredltbrgtltligtltulgtPosted 17 Days Ago Full time R20216304ltbrgtltbrgtAt LogMeIn Inc we build categorydefining products that unlock the potential of the modern workforce making it possible for millions of people and businesses around the globe do their best work whenever however and most importantly wherever Were a pioneer in remote work technology and a driving force behind todays workfromanywhere movement and have become one of the worlds largest SaaS companies with tens of millions of active users more than 3500 global employees over 12 billion in annual revenue and more than 2 million customers worldwide who use our software as an essential part of their daily lives Were headquartered in Boston Massachusetts with additional locations in North America South America Europe Asia and Australia
